name: Mech-Netic
description:
This is a 2 player CO-OP game where you have to work together to complete puzzles and reach the front of the spaceship. Both players have a mighty strong magnet that can be used to pull and drag crates around the level.

This game contains 5 playable levels each with a different and more difficult puzzle than the last. 

Controls:

Keyboard:
Left: A
Right: D
Jump: Space & W
Pull: Left Mouse Button
Push: Right Mouse Button

Controller:
Left: Right Joystick
Right: Right Joystick
Jump: A(Xbox) or X(PlayStation)
Pull: LB(Xbox) or L1(PlayStation)
Push: RB(Xbox) or R1(PlayStation)

The game requires at least one controller to be played, has to be played with 2 players. XBOX One and Playstation 5 controller supported, other controllers might work but we cannot guarantee.
